### **Government Tender Announcement**

**Title:** Aircraft Parts for the Bell 412 Fleet

**Reference Number:** PW-CAG-017-29150
**Solicitation Number:** T8493-230031/A
**Publication Date:** August 25, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** September 5, 2023, at 14:00:00

**Tender Status:** Expired

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Trade Agreements:**
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (except National Capital Region)

**Contracting Authority:**

- Valerie Bourassa, Supply Officer
- Email: [valerie.bourassa@tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:valerie.bourassa@tpsgc.gc.ca)
- Phone: (873) 455-0980

**Introduction:**
The Public Works and Government Services Canada invites qualified bidders to submit proposals for the procurement of three items: collective lever, pin collective lever, and shim collective lever pin for the Bell 412 aircraft fleet. The bid is restricted to Suppliers who are on the permanent list or meet the qualification requirements.

**Specific Requirements:**

- The requirement is to acquire 3 items (COLLECTIVE LEVER - 3 quantities, PIN COLLECTIVE LEVER - 6 quantities and SHIM COLLECTIVE LEVER PIN - 3 quantities) for the Bell 412 Aircraft Fleet for Transport Canada (TC), Air Services Directorate (ASD).
- Bidders are advised that Government Electronics Tendering System (GETS) is not responsible for the distribution of the RFP documents.
- Inquiries regarding this RFP requirement shall be submitted to the Contracting Authority listed above.

**Additional Information:**
- A Notice will be posted at least once a year on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more Suppliers to become qualified for the Supply Arrangement T8493-140035 Series.
- Suppliers interested in becoming qualified for this arrangement should contact Oliver Morones
